name: get_stock_price
description: Get the current stock price and market data for a given ticker symbol

ticker.description: The stock ticker symbol (e.g., AAPL, GOOGL, MSFT)

name: get_market_news
description: Get the latest market news and sentiment analysis. Can get news for a specific stock ticker or general market news. Returns articles with titles, summaries, sources, and sentiment scores.

ticker.description: Optional: Stock ticker to get news for (e.g., AAPL, TSLA). Leave empty for general market news.

limit.description: Number of news articles to return (default: 5, max: 10)

name: get_account_information
description: Get the user's brokerage account information including portfolio holdings, account number, and personal details. Use this when the user asks about their account, portfolio, or personal information.

ticker.description: The stock ticker symbol to purchase
The stock ticker symbol to sell
